metadataAttributes.Title: Software Testing and Automation Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Develop Skills in Software Testing. Practice and master theory, techniques, and tools to effectively test software.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Black-box Testing Techniques, White-box Testing Techniques, Unit Testing, Static Analysis, Testing Automation, Writing Test Plans, Writing Defect Reports, Understanding of Testing Theory, Writing Tests, Testing Vocabulary, Executing Tests, Software Testing,
